SUMMARY: Galactitol regulator, GatR, negatively controls expression of an operon involved in transport and catabolism of hexitol galactitol [8955298, 7772602]. gatYZABCD operon is expressed constitutively due to an insertion of IS3E into gatR gene [8955298]. Currently, no DNA-binding sites for this regulator have been reported in literature. As a member of DeoR family, GatR features an N-terminal domain containing a putative helix-turn-helix motif [8955387, 8955298].
